title: New: Jessie Ware – Running (Disclosure Remix)

excerpt.full: Brixton darling Jessie Ware’s sadcore of a stunner, Running, is only a few days old, yet this didn’t stop fellow south Londoners, Disclosure, having fun with the track’s foundations. It’s not exactly drastic in it’s reinterpretation, nor is it particularly clever, but fuck me; it’s big, bold and really fucking beautiful. via Breathing Beats
